body: i’m thankful that after a long hard day s dmed me to tell me about her coworkers at her shitty old job, two men who pronounced ramen as “ray men,,” and i immediately wrote back “everybody loves ray men” and she immediately wrote back that she had been just about to type the exact same thing. i’m thankful for rhymes.
normalized_markdown: i’m thankful that after a long hard day s dmed me to tell me about her coworkers at her shitty old job, two men who pronounced ramen as “ray men,,” and i immediately wrote back “everybody loves ray men” and she immediately wrote back that she had been just about to type the exact same thing. i’m thankful for rhymes.
